Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Kuća u centru Omiša ukupne stambene površine 62m2, a proteže se na tri etaže. U prizemlju se nalazi namještena kuhinja i dnevni boravak s blagovaonicom.Unutarnje stepenište vodi do prvog kata gdje se nalazi spavaća soba s izlazom na terasu, te kupaonica. Na drugom katu se nalazi još jedna spavaća soba, idealna kao dodatni prostor za goste ili kao prostorija za odmor. Posebna prednost ove kuće je uređeno natkriveno dvorište od 21m2, savršeno za opuštanje na otvorenom, kao i blizina plaže.Kuća je već godinama u turističkom najmu, što je čini izvrsnom prilikom za turističku investiciju. Sa svojom blizinom moru i svim lokalnim sadržajima, također predstavlja idealno stambeno rješenje. Omiš je gradić u srcu Dalmacije, smješten na aluvijalnoj naplavini lijeve obale ušća rijeke Cetine, koja u tom dijelu, probijajući se kroz kamene zidove okolnih planina, kanjonom otvara kontinentalni pristup moru. Nigdje nema toliko kontrasta – Omiš je već svojim lokalitetom istinska atrakcija. _______________________________________________________________ A house in the center of Omiš with a total living area of 62m2 and extends over three floors. On the ground floor there is a furnished kitchen and a living room with a dining room. An internal staircase leads to the first floor, where there is a bedroom with access to the terrace, and a bathroom. On the second floor there is another bedroom, ideal as an additional space for guests or as a rest room. A special advantage of this house is the landscaped covered yard of 21m2, perfect for outdoor relaxation, as well as the proximity to the beach. The house has been in tourist rental for years, which makes it an excellent opportunity for a tourist investment. With its proximity to the sea and all local facilities, it also represents an ideal housing solution. Omiš is a small town in the heart of Dalmatia, located on the alluvial alluvium of the left bank of the mouth of the river Cetina, which in that part, breaking through the stone walls of the surrounding mountains, opens a continental access to the sea through a canyon. Nowhere are there so many contrasts – Omiš is already a real attraction due to its location. _______________________________________________________________ Kupac plaća proviziju / The Buyer pays the commission BROKER-Group RealEstate Croatia Obala kneza Branimira 1 21 000 Split, CROATIA tel.: +385 21 541 000 http://www.broker.hr
